Name: Sticky Hand
Description: Increases hand size by 1. Current size is {7 + 0}.

Name: Snakes
Description: Decreases number of cards needed to make a straight by 1

Name: Finger Monster
Description: Allows you to play special cards in standard card slots

Name: Tanka Truck
Description: Allows you to discard any number of cards at once

Description: Whenever you discard two or more aces at onceCOMMA gain 200 Diamonds

Name: Plastic Brick
Description: Decreases the number of cards needed to make a flush by 1

Name: Domino
Description: Decreases the number of cards needed to make a straight flush by 1

Name: Ladders
Description: Increases the max gap in a straights and straight flushes by 1

Name: Snap Bracelet
Description: Straights and straight flushes can wrap

Name: Cat's Eye
Description: All played cards count as part of your scored hand

Name: Telescope
Description: Increases the number of playable standard cards by 1COMMA unlocking new hand types

Name: Black Queen
Description: Increases the number of playable special cards by 1
